biometric_consent.body:
How Stripe will verify your data

Stripe will use biometric technology (on images of you and your IDs) and other data sources to confirm your identity and for fraud and security purposes.

Learn about Stripe

Learn how Stripe Identity works
biometric_consent.title: How Stripe will verify your identity

success.body:
Thank you for providing your information

Rocket Rides will reach out if additional details are required.

Next steps

Rocket Rides will contact regarding the outcome of your identification process.

More about Stripe Identity

Learn how Stripe Identity works

Stripe's privacy policy

Frequently asked questions

Contact Stripe
success.title: Verification pending

welcome.body:
Data will be stored and may be used according to Stripe [Privacy Policy](https://verify.stripe.com) and the Rocket Rides Privacy Policy. [Learn more](https://verify.stripe.com).

Please have a form of identification ready, and be prepared to take a selfie.
welcome.title: Rocket Rides partners with Stripe for secure identity verification
